about_the_game:
Worldseekers is a GPS exploration RPG. Discover rare cards, events, and unique characters as you delve into the expansive lands and deceptive dungeons of this world.

To help encourage mental and physical health, Worldseekers uses GPS mechanics and links to a phone app to help you get outside and walking. Of course, the Steam version allows you to play from your PC for hours while still rewarding you for taking an extra stroll. For all you streamers out there, we adjust / hide location by default.

Sign up for our email newsletter at worldseekers.io (we still have all the other social media stuff, but email is wayyy better IMO)

Turn the world into a fantastical land of mystery and arcana:

  • Defeat unique and difficult monsters

  • Enjoy fun and puzzling narrative

  • The ever-changing lands adapt to your play-style

  • Take home dungeons and other content to reward yourself for healthy habits

Explore a vast world of mystery and magic.

Battle legendary creatures and explore dungeon depths.

Develop relationships with a vast array of townspeople.

And if you have questions, feedback, or want to support us (we could definitely use it), feel free to reach out to me on Twitch or YouTube (Final Boss Editing)!
